wikipedia_page.main: John Thynne, 3rd Baron Carteret PC (28 December 1772 – 10 March 1849), known as Lord John Thynne between 1789 and 1838, was a British peer and politician.

response: *John Thynne, 3rd Baron Carteret (1772–1849), English peer and politician

Lord Carteret survived his wife by two years and died at Dalkeith Palace, Midlothian, in February 1838, aged 68. He was succeeded in the barony by his younger brother, John Thynne, 3rd Baron Carteret.
*John Thynne, 3rd Baron Carteret PC (1772–1849), British peer and politician
